Spells-Occult -- Female Dromaar Human Bard: 10
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +3
Background: Astrologer Deity: Nethys
Experience: 9275/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Attribute Notes: Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills

Dromaar: Has the orc and dromaar traits and can take orc and dromaar ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +18 (wisdom; expert)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Driving Lore): Skill Trained (Driving Lore)
Skill Training (Sailing Lore): Skill Trained (Sailing Lore)
Assurance (Astral Plane Lore): Can take an automatic 26 on Astral Plane Lore checks
Assurance (Circus Lore): Can take an automatic 22 on Circus Lore checks
Assurance (Occultism): Can take an automatic 22 on Occultism checks
Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Combat Reading: (1) Successful Occultism vs. the higher of the target's Deception or Stealth DC reveals a target weakness, poorest save, or highest resistance; critical success gives 2 of these, and critical failure gives false information
Know-It-All: Successful Recall Knowledge checks give additional information
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Soulsight: Has 60' imprecise spiritsense
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on a chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 108 Armor Class: 25 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Bard: 25 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Crossbow (+14 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Heavy Crossbow (+14 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Light Pick (+14 1d4+2 P [Crit d8]; strength; trained)

Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Performer's Heart: Save Master (Will)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Performer's Heart: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +17 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Occult: 27 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Alarm (O1): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Animated Assault (O2): (2) R120' Loose objects in a 10' burst inflict 2d10 HP bludgeoning initially and 1d10 HP bludgeoning on subsequent rd while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d10 HP initially and +1d10 HP when sustained)
Augury (O2): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Bane (O1): (2) 10' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min (save Will negates); a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 10'
Banishment (O5): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bestial Curse (O4): (2) Touched suffers clumsy 1, requires a successful DC 5 flat check for manipulate actions, and gains a claw, hoof, horn, or jaws Strike for 1 hr (save Fortitude only inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent)
Bind Undead (O3): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Blanket Of Stars (O6): (2) Gives self +2 Stealth to Hide and Sneak and invisibility or concealment when still or moving beneath a starry sky, and inflicts dazzled for 1 rd on adjacent creatures (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts confused
Bless (O1): (2) 15' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 10'
Blinding Fury (O6): (R) R60' Makes self hidden from the triggering attacker for 1 rd after every damaging attack for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent and also affect the target's perception of other creatures)
Blindness (O3): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blister (O5): (2) R60' Allows self to create 2 15' cones from target that each inflict 7d6 HP acid (save basic Fortitude) anytime within 1 min (save Fortitude allows 1 cone; critical success negates; critical failure allows 4 cones)
Blistering Invective (OC1): (2) Allows self voice to be heard up to 500' away, giving +1 Coerce and auditory Perform in large venues (heightened 5th extends voice to 1200'; 7th extends voice to 1 mile)
Blood Vendetta (O2): (R) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP persistent bleed and weakness 1 to piercing and slashing on a target that has inflicted piercing, slashing, or persistent bleed on self (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Blur (O2): (2) Touched becomes concealed for 1 min
Calm (O2): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile action ends the spell for the target (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows the effects to continue after a hostile action)
Canticle Of Everlasting Grief (O8): (2) R120' Inflicts 10d6 HP mental, frightened 3, a curse that negates of circumstance and status bonuses for 1 week (save Will inflicts half HP, frightened 1, and cursed for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, frightened 4, and permanent curse that also affects allies within 15'
Carryall (O1): (2) Creates an invisible 2' radius disk that follows self and holds 5 Bulk for 8 hr (heightened 4th allows carrying passengers and 10 Bulk
Charitable Urge (O2): (2) R30' Compels the target to give a possession to the nearest creature (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 4 rd or until a successful save)
Charm (O1): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Chroma Leach (O4): (2) Touched suffers enfeebled 2 for 1 min and drained 1 and must succeed on a Will save to move for 1 rd (save Fortitude only inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 2 permanently and drained 2)
Clairaudience (O3): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to listen from the target location for 10 min
Clairvoyance (O4): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 10 min
Cleanse Affliction (O2): (2) Reduces the stage of a curse, disease, or poison affecting touched by 1 (heightened 3rd attempts to counteract a disease or poison; 4th attempts to counteract a curse, disease, or poison)
Clear Mind (O2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fleeing, frightened, or stupefied effect affecting touched (heightened 4th can counteract confused, controlled, or slows; 6th can counteract doomed; 8th can counteract stunned)
Cloak Of Colors (O5): (2) R30' Creatures adjacent to the target suffer dazzled, and successful attackers suffer blinded for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd), for 1 min
Collective Transposition (O6): (2) Teleports 2 targets within a 30' radius (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to control the teleport) (heightened +1 affects +1 target)
Command (O1): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Concordant Choir (O1): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4 HP; 2 or 3 actions inflicts 2d4 HP sonic in a 10' or 30' radius (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP for 1 action or +2d4 HP for 2 or 3)
Confusing Colors (O8): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts confused for 1d4 rd and dazzled in a 40' radius while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1d4 rd, then confused for the remaining duration)
Confusion (O4): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 min or until a successful save (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows no further save attempts) (heightened 8th affects 10 targets)
Containment (O4): (2) R30' Creates around the target an impassible force field with immunity to critical hits and precision damage, Harness 10, and 40 HP for 1 min or until destroyed (save Reflex decreases the HP to 10; critical success negates) (heightened +1 increases field Hit Points by 5 or 15 on save success or failure
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Countless Eyes (O4): (2) Touched can see in all directions, cannot be flanked, and critically succeeds on a Seek success for 1 min
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Cozy Cabin (O3): (1 min) R30' Creates a 20'x20'x10' comfortable wooden cabin for 12 hr or until self exits
Curse Of Lost Time (O3): (2) Touched object suffers 4d6 HP, becomes shoddy, cannot be repaired, and counteracts magical attempts to repair it (save Fortitude by bearer negates); touched construct suffers 4d6 HP and clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, cannot be repaired, and counteracts magical attempts to repair it for 1 hr (save basic Fortitude; critical failure makes effects permanent); touched living creature suffers clumsy 1 and enfeebled 1 for 1 hr (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure makes effects permanent)
Cursed Metamorphosis (O6): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Darkvision (O2): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (OC1): (2) R60' Inflicts 1d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (O2): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Deja Vu (O1): (2) R100' Forces the target to repeat its next rd action in the following round, or, if repeating is impossible, inflicts stupefied 1 after an action until the end of its turn (save Will negates)
Detect Magic (OC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Scrying (O4): (2) 30' emanation reveals scrying effects, along with the scrying creature for lower-level effects, for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Disappearance (O8): (2) Touched becomes undetectable by any sense for 10 min
Disguise Magic (O1): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 2nd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Dispel Magic (O2): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dispelling Globe (O4): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Dizzying Colors (O1): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Dominate (O6): (2) R30' Self controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends the spell (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dragon Form (O6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dream Council (O8): (10 min) Allows 12 known targets to communicate through a shared dream for 1 hr
Dream Message (O3): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Dreaming Potential (O5): (10 min) Touched receives a day of downtime retraining during 8 hr sleep
Drop Dead (O5): (R) R120' Upon receiving the triggering wound, the target becomes invisible and is replaced by an illusionary corpse while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile act by the target ends the spell (heightened 7th a hostile act does not end the spell)
Dull Ambition (O4): (2) Target must use the worse of two rolls on all initiative and downtime activity checks for 1 day (save Will effects last 1 hr and only affect initiative; critical success negates; critical failure effects last indefinitely)
Duplicate Foe (O7): (3) R30' Creates a minion copy of a target up to level 15 with 70 HP and no special abilities while sustained for up to 1 min or until reduced to 0 HP; the copy loses 4d6 HP after each turn (save Fortitude the copy inflicts half HP and lasts 2 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 increases the target level that can be copied by 2 and the copy HP by 10)
Embed Message (O2): (2) Illusory text and a disembodied voice convey a specified message of up to 25 words the next time a specified trigger occurs within 30' (heightened 4th can include additional sensory effects; 6th message can repeat multiple times)
Energy Aegis (O7): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, vitality, void, and sonic damage until next daily prep (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enfeeble (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 for 1 min)
Enthrall (O3): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained, with additional saves for disagreement (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure allows no further saves)
Everlight (O2): (3) Touched gemstone emits 20' bright light until dismissed
Fabricated Truth (O10): (3) R100' 5 targets believe a specified statement for 1 week (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects are permanent)
False Vision (O5): (10 min) Controls the image shown by scrying within a 100' burst until next daily prep
False Vitality (O2): (2) Self gains 10 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
Familiar's Face (O3): (2) Allows self to perceive and speak through target animal companion or familiar senses while sustained
Fear (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Figment (OC1): (2) R30' Creates a simply illusory sound or vision while sustained
Final Sacrifice (O2): (2) R120' Explosion of target minion slays it and inflicts 6d6 HP fire, or 6d6 HP cold if the minion is a cold or water creature, in a 20' radius (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Flicker (O4): (2) Self gains resistance 5 to non-force damage and can use Sustain to randomly teleport 10' for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +3 resistance)
Fly (O4): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)
Forbidding Ward (OC1): (2) R30' Target gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. a specified foe while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 Armor Class and saves)
Force Barrage (O1): (1) R120' 1 shard (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 shards) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional shard per action)
Foresight (O9): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer off-guard vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self can use a reaction to give the target the better of 2 rolls or its foe the worse of 2 rolls, for 1 hr
Freeze Time (O10): (3) Allows self to perform 3 rd of actions that don't affect others until the spell ends
Gaseous Form (O4): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or self ends the spell
Gate (O10): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Ghostly Carrier (O2): (2) R120' Creates a crawling, spectral hand that delivers touch spells for 1 min; damage to the hand ends the spell
Ghostly Tragedy (O4): (1 min) Spirits reenact the 9 min leading up to a named victim's injury and 1 min afterward, inflicting 2d6 HP void on self
Ghostly Weapon (O3): (2) Touched weapon becomes translucent and can affect incorporeal creatures for 5 min
Ghoulish Cravings (O2): (2) Touched suffers sickened 2 that requires eating raw meat to remove (save Will inflicts sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 that requires eating raw meat to reduce)
Glibness (O4): (2) Self gains +14 Deception to lie and against Perception to discern truth for 10 min
Gravity Well (O3): (2) R120' 30' burst moves creatures and unsecured objects 15' toward its center (save Reflex moves 5'; critical success negates; critical failure moves 30')
Grim Tendrils (O1): (2) 30' line inflicts 2d4 HP negative and 1 HP persistent bleed on living creatures (save Fortitude inflicts half HP negative only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Guidance (OC1): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Hallucination (O5): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of an object or group for 1 hr (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets or effects last until next daily prep; 8th affects any number of targets or effects are permanent)
Haste (O3): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Haunting Hymn (OC1): (2) 15' cone inflicts 1d8 HP sonic (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts deafened for 1 min) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Heroism (O3): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Hidden Mind (O8): (2) R30' Target gains +4 saves vs. mental effects and automatic counteract attempts at the spell level + 1 vs. detection, revelation, and scrying until next daily prep
Humanoid Form (O2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hypercognition (O3): (1) Allows self to use 6 Recall Knowledge actions immediately
Hypnotize (O3): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of reactions)
Ill Omen (O1): (2) Target suffers worse of 2 rolls on the next attack or skill check within 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure affects all attacks and skill checks within 1 rd)
Illusory Creature (O2): (2) R500' Creates an image of a Large or smaller creature with Armor Class 27, +17 attack, 3d4 saves while sustained or until damaged; each Sustain allows directing 2 actions (heightened +1 creature inflicts +1d4 HP and can be 1 size larger)
Illusory Disguise (O1): (2) R30' Makes the target appear different and gives +4 Deception, plus the target level if untrained, to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 3rd allows copying a specific individual; 4th affects 10 targets; 7th affects 10 targets and allows copying specific individuals)
Illusory Object (O1): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (O5): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Imaginary Lockbox (O5): (1 min) Touched container becomes accessible only to self until next daily prep; items can only be removed and require 3 actions to do so
Imprint Message (O1): (2) Stores in the touched object a short message or emotion that can be retrieved by Object Reading
Indestructibility (O10): (2) Gives self immunity to harm for 1 rd
Interplanar Teleport (O7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Invisibility (O2): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Invisible Item (O1): (2) Touched object becomes invisible for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last until next daily prep; 7th effects last indefinitely)
Invoke Spirits (O5): (2) R120' 10' burst, movable 30' per rd, inflicts 2d4 HP mental and 2d4 HP void while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts frightened 2, plus fleeing in the first rd) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP mental and void)
Item Facade (O1): (2) Makes the target object up to a 10' cube appear decrepit or perfect for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 24 hr; 3rd effects are permanent)
Knock (O2): (2) R30' Gives +4 Athletics or Thievery on attempts to open the target object for 1 min; untrained attempts by self gain an additional +10
Know The Way (OC1): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 3rd reveals direction to a location visited in the past week; 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Laughing Fit (O2): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of reactions)
Levitate (O3): (2) Allows self to use concentrate actions to move the touched object or willing creature up or down 10' for 5 min
Light (OC1): (2) R120' Orb lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Liminal Doorway (O4): (10 min) Drawn doorway leads to an 20' cubic extradimensional space for 8 hr or until erased
Locate (O3): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Lock (O1): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 27 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Mariner's Curse (O5): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Marvelous Mount (O2): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 25, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 3rd mount can walk on water; 4th mount has 60' Speed; 5th mount can also fly for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Mask Of Terror (O7): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Mending (O1): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell rank to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (OC1): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Mind Probe (O5): (1 min) R30' Self gains answers from the target, requiring a DC 27 Deception check to refuse to answer each, with critical success giving a believable false answer (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Mind Reading (O3): (2) R30' Reveals the surface thoughts of the target and whether its intelligence is higher, lower, or equal (save Will reveals relative intelligence only; critical success allows the target to read self's surface thoughts instead; critical failure allows sustaining for up to 1 min with no further save attempts)
Mindlink (O1): (2) Telepathically transmits 10 min of information from self to touched
Mirage (O4): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Mislead (O6): (2) Turns self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful Deception vs. Perception can make it appear that a self action originated with the duplicate
Mystic Armor (O1): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Never Mind (O6): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 4 until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent animal intelligence and -5 Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers and changes a PC into an NPC)
Nightmare (O4): (10 min) Causes a familiar target to have nightmares and awaken fatigued (save Will inflicts nightmares only; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts drained 2 until no longer fatigued)
Noise Blast (O2): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic and deafened for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, deafened for 1 min, and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Nondetection (O3): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Object Reading (O1): (2) Reveals a piece of information about an emotional event involving the touched object that occurred within the past week (heightened 2nd extends effects to the past month; 4th extends effects to the past year; 6th extends effects to the past decade; 8th extends effects to the past century; 9th extends effects indefinitely)
Outcast's Curse (O4): (2) Touched suffers 1 step worse initial attitudes and the worse of 2 Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until the curse is removed (save Will effects last for 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes 2 steps worse)
Overwhelming Presence (O9): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for 6 turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Paralyze (O3): (2) R30' Inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd; subsequent successful saves shorten the effects by 1 rd, and a critical success ends them) (heightened 7th affects 10 targets)
Paranoia (O2): (2) R30' Target becomes unfriendly to all others for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure causes target to treat all others as enemies) (heightened 6th effects 5 targets)
Peaceful Bubble (O4): (10 min) 100' burst around touched location blocks sensory information, scrying, and mind-reading for 24 hr; sleeping within for 8 hr reduces doomed conditions by 2
Peaceful Rest (O2): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Pest Cache (O1): (1) Moves companion into a pocket dimension for up to 8 hr
Phantasmagoria (O9): (2) R120' Inflicts 16d6 HP mental and confused for 1 rd on all targets within range (save Will inflicts half HP loss of reactions for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and confused for 1 min)
Phantasmal Calamity (O6): (2) R500' 30' burst inflicts 11d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1 and trapped (save Reflex negates) until a subsequent Will save each rd succeeds) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Phantasmal Minion (O1): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Phantasmal Treasure (O2): (2) R60' Target becomes fascinated with illusionary treasure for 1 min (save Will effects last until end of target's turn; critical success negates; critical failure causes target to use all actions to interact with the treasure
Phantom Pain (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d4 HP mental, 1d4 HP persistent mental, and sickened 1 for 1 min or until no longer sickened (save Will inflicts initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1d4 HP persistent)
Pinpoint (O8): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object
Planar Palace (O7): (1 min) R30' Creates an entrance to a 40'x40'x30' demiplane that can be entered only by those specified, is staffed by servants, and contains provisions for up to 150 people
Planar Seal (O7): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Planar Tether (O4): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Possession (O7): (2) R30' Self inhabits and controls the target's body for 1 min (save Will self inhabits but cannot control; critical success negates; critical failure gives control without further saves); a success on subsequent Will saves each turn negates control for 1 rd, and a critical success ends the spell (heightened 9th effects last for 10 min, and self body merges into possessed body)
Prestidigitation (OC1): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Project Image (O7): (2) R30' Creates an illusory copy of self, with the same Armor Class and saves, that can be used as a source of spells while sustained for up to 1 min or until damaged (heightened +2 extends maximum sustain to 10 min)
Protection (O1): (2) Touched gains +1 Armor Class and saves for 1 min (heightened 3rd effects allies in a 10' emanation around target)
Quandary (O8): (2) R30' Transports the target to an extradimensional puzzle room while sustained or until it gains 2 solution steps; success on a Thievery, Occultism, or Perception check gives 1 step, critical success gives 2 steps, and critical failure negates any previous successes
Read Aura (OC1): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and gives +2 to Identify Magic on it (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Read Omens (O4): (10 min) Reveals a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Reaper's Lantern (O2): (2) Lights a 5' emanation, inflicts enfeebled 1 on undead, and negates half of healing effects on living (save Fortitude negates) for 1 min; a Sustain each turn increases the radius by 5'
Remake (O10): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Repulsion (O6): (2) Emanation up to 40' prevents creatures from approaching for 1 min (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (O2): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Resplendent Mansion (O9): (1 min) R500' Creates a 300'x300' mansion, with entrances protected by Alarm effects and containing provisions for up to 150 people, until next daily prep
Retrocognition (O7): (1 min) Reveals impressions of 1 day of past events at the current location per 1 min of concentration; traumatic events require a Will save to maintain the spell (heightened 8th gives impressions of 1 year per min; 9th gives impressions of 1 century per min)
Revealing Light (O2): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 1 min (save Reflex effects last 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Rewrite Memory (O4): (2) R30' Changes 1 rd of the target's memory each rd while sustained for up to 5 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt) (heightened 6th erases all memory of a specified topic from a willing target)
Ring Of Truth (O3): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negatesinflicts -4 Deception)
Rouse Skeletons (O3): (2) R60' 10' burst inflicts 2d6 HP slashing (save basic Reflex) while sustained for up to 1 min; the area of effect can be moved 20' each rd (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Runic Body (O1): (2) Touched creature's unarmed attack gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Runic Weapon (O1): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Sanctuary (O1): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends the spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Schadenfreude (O1): (R) R30' Inflicts stupefied for 1 rd in response to a critical failure on a save vs. an effect from the target (save Will inflicts -1 Perception and Will for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd and stunned 1)
Scintillating Safeguard (O6): (R) R30' Gives 5 targets resistance 10 vs. triggering physical or energy damage (heightened +1 gives resistance +1)
Scouting Eye (O5): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Scrying (O6): (10 min) Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see the target creature while sustained for up to 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to glimpse self; critical failure allows the sensor to follow the target; scrying an unfamiliar target lowers the save DC by 2, and scrying an unknown target lowers it by 10)
Seal Fate (O4): (2) Touched suffers weakness 2 to a specified damage type, plus death when reduced to 0 HP by that damage type if the target is level 7 or less, for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts weakness 2 only until the end of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure effects last indefinitely) (heightened +2 inflicts weakness +1 and increases the maximum target level to suffer death by 4)
See The Unseen (O2): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Seize Soul (O9): (2) R30' Traps the soul of a corpse dead for less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or the gem is destroyed
Sending (O5): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature
Shadow Blast (O5): (2) 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 6d8 HP of a choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Shared Invisibility (O3): (2) 30' emanation makes self and 5 willing targets invisible for 10 min or until any target performs a hostile act (heightened 5th affects self and 10 targets, and effects last for 1 hr)
Shatter (O2): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shield (OC1): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class for 1 rd and can end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened +2 gives Hardness +5)
Sigil (OC1): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Silence (O2): (2) Willing touched makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around touched)
Sleep (O1): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts unconsciousness for 1 min or until a successful Perception check (save Will inflicts -1 Perception for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts unconsciousness for 1 hr or until a successful Perception check) (heightened 4th inflicts unconsciousness for 1 rd, or 1 min on a critical failure, followed by normal sleep; targets release held objects and do not wake from a successful Perception check)
Slither (O5): (3) R120' 20' bursts inflict 3d6 HP piercing, 1d6 HP persistent poison, and grabbed for 1 min; requires a successful success on a DC 27 Escape or inflicting 12 HP vs. Armor Class 27 to escape (save Reflex negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP persistent poison and requires +6 HP damage to escape)
Slow (O3): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Soothe (O1): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Sound Body (O2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blinded, dazzled, deafness, enfeebled, or sickened effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract drained; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Spell Riposte (O7): (R) Attempts to counteract the triggering targeted spell; success redirects the spell upon the caster
Spellwrack (O6): (2) R30' Until the curse is removed, each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of every spell affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (O6): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP spirit (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (O1): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from a willing target to self for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spirit Sense (O2): (2) Self gains a 30' automatic Search for spirits and haunts, +1 Seek, Recall Knowledge, Armor Class, and saving throws with spirits and haunts, and +1 skill checks to disable a haunt, for 10 min
Spirit Song (O8): (2) 60' cone inflicts 14d6 HP spirit, stunned 1, and loss of reaction until the beginning of their turns on spirits, including any hidden in solid barriers (save Fortitude inflicts half HP and negates stunned; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and stunned 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spiritual Armament (O2): (2) R120' Spectral weapon makes a spell attack that inflicts 2d8 HP spirit or weapon damage type each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Spiritual Epidemic (O8): (2) R120' Inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 min and enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 permanently; also affects creatures who later cast divine or occult spells on the target (save Will inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 and stupefied 3 for 1 min and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently)
Status (O2): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Strange Geometry (O5): (3) R60' 4 10' disconnected cubes inflict difficult terrain for all modes of movement and teleportation between cubes upon exit for 1 min (save Will negates)
Stupefy (O2): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 min (save Will inflicts stupefied 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 3)
Subconscious Suggestion (O5): (2) R30' Specified trigger prompts the target to follow a reasonable, 1 min suggestion until next daily prep (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure inflicts following the suggestion for 1 hr) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Suggestion (O4): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion for 1 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects last for 1 hr) (heightened 8th targets 10 creatures)
Summon Dragon (O5): (3) R30' A level 5 dragon appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Entity (O5): (3) R30' A level 5 aberration appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Fey (O1): (3) R30' A level -1 fey appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Instrument (OC1): (3) Creates a handheld musical instrument that self can play for 1 hr (Heightened 5th creates a virtuoso instrument
Summon Undead (O1): (3) R30' A level -1 undead appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Sure Footing (O2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a clumsy, grabbed, or paralysis effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract immobilized or restrained; 6th attempts to counteract petrified; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Synaptic Pulse (O5): (2) 30' emanation inflicts stunned 2 (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd)
Synesthesia (O5): (2) R30' Inflicts a DC 5 flat check for concentration, clumsy 3, -10 Speed, and concealment of all objects and creatures for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 2) (heightened 9th affects 5 targets)
Talking Corpse (O4): (10 min) Touched corpse truthfully answers 3 questions within 10 min (save Will allows lying or refusing to answer; critical success prevents self from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on Deception checks when giving misleading answers)
Telekinetic Hand (OC1): (2) R30' Moves a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd moves a Bulk 1 object; 5th R60'; 7th moves a Bulk 2 object)
Telekinetic Haul (O5): (2) R120' Moves an 80 Bulk, 20' cubic object 20' each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Telekinetic Maneuver (O2): (2) R60' Spell attack attempts to Disarm, Shove, or Trip
Telekinetic Projectile (OC1): (2) Spell attack hurls a loose object that inflicts 1d6+3 HP of the appropriate damage type, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Telepathic Demand (O9): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with an existing telepathic target, sending a Suggestion as part of the message (save Will gives immunity for 1 day; critical success gives immunity for 1 month)
Telepathy (O4): (2) Allows self to communicate telepathically with any creature in a 30' radius for 10 min (heightened 6th allows communication with creatures without a shared language)
Teleport (O6): (10 min) Transports self and 4 willing touched creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 10th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Thoughtful Gift (O1): (1) R120' Teleports a light Bulk object from self to a willing target (heightened 3rd extends range to 500'; 5th teleports a Bulk 1 item, and using 3 actions extends range to 1 mile
Threefold Aspect (O3): (1 min) Allows self to use a Sustain to polymorph between young adult, adult, and elderly forms for 1 min, gaining +4 Deception to pass as the selected age, for 1 min
Translate (O2): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Translocate (O4): (2) Teleports self to a visible location within 120' (heightened 5th allows teleporting to a familiar location within 1 mile)
True Target (O7): (1) R60' Allies' attacks within 1 rd on a designated creature use the better of 2 attack rolls and ignore circumstance penalties and concealed and hidden conditions
Truesight (O6): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Truespeech (O5): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Umbral Journey (O5): (1 min) Allows self and 10 willing touched to travel through the Netherworld at 72x Speed for 8 hr
Uncontrollable Dance (O8): (2) Touched suffers off-guard and no reactions for 1 min and spends 2 actions each turn dancing (save Will effects last for 3 rd and the target spends 1 action each turn dancing; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min and the target spends all actions each turn dancing)
Unfathomable Song (O9): (2) R120' Randomly inflicts frightened 2, confused for 1 rd, stupefied 4 for 1 rd, or blinded for 1 rd on 5 targets while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure replaces frightened 2 with stunned for 1 rd and stupefied 1)
Unrelenting Observation (O8): (2) R100' 5 targets in a 20' burst can see a 6th target for 1 hr; lead and running water block the vision (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates)
Vampiric Exsanguination (O6): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Feast (O3): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Maiden (O4): (2) R30' Inflicts 4d4 HP piercing, 4d4 HP void, and immobilized for 1 rd (Interact action ends), giving self temporary Hit Points equal to the void damage for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and immobilization for 1 rd or until a successful Escape) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP piercing and void)
Veil Of Privacy (O3): (10 min) Attempts to counteract detection, revelation, and scrying cast against the target for 8 hr
Ventriloquism (O1): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Pattern (O6): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles and blinds creatures while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful save each rd after leaving the area removes the blindness (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure blinds for 1 min with no further saves)
Vision Of Death (O4): (2) R120' Inflicts 8d6 HP mental, frightened 2, and death if taken to 0 HP (save Will inflicts half HP, frightened 1, and death at 0 HP; critical success negates; critical failure double HP, frightened 4, death at 0 HP, and fleeing until no longer frightened) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Visions Of Danger (O7): (3) R500' 30' burst inflicts 8d8 HP mental for 1 min (save basic Will; critical success allows an attempt to disbelieve that negates the effects) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Void Warp (OC1): (2) Touch inflicts 2d4 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Vomit Swarm (O2): (2) 30' cone inflicts 2d8 HP piercing and sickened 1 (save basic Reflex also negates sickened) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Wails Of The Damned (O9): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP void and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Wall Of Flesh (O5): (2) R60' Creates a 30'x20'x3' wall of flesh, each 5' section with Armor Class 10 and 75 Hit Points, that either inflicts 2d6 HP piercing, gives self +2 Perception within the wall's line of sight, or grabs for 1 rd or until a successful Escape (save Reflex negates; critical failure grabs), for 1 min (heightened +2 gives each section +10 Hit Points and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Force (O6): (3) R30' Creates an invisible 50'x20' wall with Armor Class 10, Harness 30, and 60 HP that blocks physical effects and corporeal, incorporeal, and ethereal creatures for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +20 HP)
Wanderer's Guide (O3): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain while following it by half until next daily prep
Warp Mind (O7): (2) R120' Inflicts confused for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent confusion)
Wave Of Despair (O5): (2) 30' cone prevents reactions, and failure on a second save inflicts slowed 1, for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min with no second save) (heightened 7th affects a 60' cone)
Whispers Of The Void (O4): (2) R60' 10' burst inflicts 4d8 HP persistent void and drained 1 (save Fortitude inflicts 2d8 HP persistent void only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts drained 2 and doomed 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP, or +1d8 HP on a successful save)
Zealous Conviction (O6): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Enigma: Knows the Sure Strike occult spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Annotate Composition: Can spend 10 minutes and a Focus Point to write a 1-action composition spell that can be activated by anyone until next daily prep
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Directed Audience: Can redirect the emanation of a composition spell into a cone up to 10' longer and twice the area
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
